title: 36 Backstage Photos From The 2017 Academy Awards
text:

Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607600 2. Mahershala Ali and Ryan Gosling looking dapper AF. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607596 3. Trevante Rhodes and Andre Holland, the adult Chiron and Kevin in Moonlight respectively, also looking dapper AF. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608414 4. The reunion of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607794 5. A sweet moment between Janelle Monae, Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer, and NASA mathematician Katherine Johnson, who Henson portrays in Hidden Figures . View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607710 6. The adorable stars of La La Land , Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607745 7. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608356 8. Honestly, does it get any cuter than these two? View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607948 9. Oh yes, it does: Here’s Brie Larson and Emma Stone embracing after Stone won for Best Actress. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607708 10. And here’s Taraji P. Henson feeling all sorts of things about Auli’i Cravalho’s performance of “How Far I’ll Go” from Moana . View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607717 11. Trevante Rhodes and Ashton Sanders, who both play Chiron at different points in his life in Moonlight , sharing a joyous moment. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608419 12. Viola Davis looking radiant after winning her first Oscar. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608329 13. Amy Adams, who presented at Oscars — and who some think was snubbed for a Best Actress nomination for her performance in Arrival . View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608480 14. Moonlight screenwriter Tarell Alvin McCraney and writer/director Barry Jenkins after they won Best Adapted Screenplay. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607945 15. Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux, looking like all of us after the end of the show. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608325 16. And looking like we all wish we did View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607742 17. Meryl Streep, who was nominated for her 20th Oscar on Sunday night. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608320 18. Presenter Samuel L. Jackson in his navy and black tux. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608348 19. Sting, who performed his Oscar-nominated song “The Empty Chair” from Jim: The James Foley Story . View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608234 20. Chrissy Teigen and John Legend being relationship goals. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608267 21. Best Actor Casey Affleck and Best Actress Emma Stone after their respective wins. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607960 22. And here’s Denzel Washington, who was nominated for Best Actor, but lost to Affleck. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608397 23. Here’s Brie Larson and Amy Adams sharing a laugh. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607784 24. And Leonardo DiCaprio and Emma Stone after he presented her with the Best Actress Oscar. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608432 25. Look at these two! View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607780 26. D’a . View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608410 27. Hailee Steinfeld, who presented at the 89th Academy Awards. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608326 28. Charlize Theron and Shirley MacLaine preparing before presenting Best Foreign Language Film. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10607739 29. Jennifer Aniston and Nicole Kidman embrace. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608334 30. Ashton Sanders and Jharrel Jerome, who play teenage versions of Chiron and Kevin in Moonlight , celebrate. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608436 31. So. Much. Love. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608422 32. Casey Affleck and Leonardo DiCaprio, both Best Actor winners. View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608424 33. Cast members and crew from both La La Land and Moonlight on stage together after the Best Picture mishap . View this image ›
Christopher Polk / Getty Images ID: 10608504 34. Alex Hibbert and Ashton Sanders after learning Moonlight won Best Picture. View this image ›
